title: Bradley Cooper the doting dad beams at toddler daughter Lea on stroll around NYC
text:
He's one happy daddy.

Bradley Cooper had a huge smile on his face as he was spotted carrying his adorable daughter Lea De Seine Shayk Cooper in NYC on Thursday.

The two-year-old appeared to be enjoying the ride in the 44-year-old actor's arms.

Daddy's girl: Bradley Cooper had a huge smile on his face as he was spotted carrying his adorable daughter Lea De Seine Shayk Cooper in NYC on Thursday.

The little blonde looked incredibly cute in a grey hoodie covered with colorful images of animals, which she wore over a black and white gingham dress, shoes and white socks.

Bradley, who also carried a small. light blue rucksack, likely full of Lea's things, donned a dark blue pea jacket, blue cargo pants and heavy brown boots.

He shares his little girl with his ex-girlfriend, Russian supermodel Irina Shayk.

The Guardians Of The Galaxy actor and the stunning 33-year-old called it quits in June after four years together.

Bonding moment: The little blonde, two, looked cute in a grey hoodie covered with colorful images of animals, which she wore over a black and white gingham dress, shoes and socks

They have since become devoted co-parents to little Lea.

Meanwhile, Irina was spotted out with her British fashion photographer pal Rowan Papier on Wednesday, sparking romance rumors.

She showed off her enviably slender physique in skin-tight black cycling shorts that she teamed with a black and white sports shirt and a bright yellow vest.

Comfy and casual: Bradley, 44, donned a dark blue pea jacket, blue cargo pants and heavy brown boots for the outing

Bradley is as busy as ever in his career with four projects on the go.

His Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 3, in which he voices Rocket, is in pre-production along with director Guillermo del Toro's drama Nightmare Alley and WWII movie Atlantic Wall.

He has also been announced for the lead role in Bernstein about the life of the iconic composer Leonard Bernstein,
